text: @MayorOfLA @CAgovernor Good.Drunk ppl won't social distance. There were way too many ppl in my area at bars & walking w/ masks pulled down in crowds & in lines to get in. Last nt I was told an employee at my local mkt just died fighting COVID-19 for 3 WKS! Thx careless ppl. smh
